channel.title: I would like devs to confirm this and give me a medal
channel.description:
3 games ago I made my name "bronzefish" and my class was Evil King
2 games ago I made my name "silverfish" and my class was Neutral king
Last game I made my name "goldfish" and my class was Good king
Devs plz confirm this and have your minds blown. Seriously what are the odds of that happening?

item.title: I would like devs to confirm this and give me a medal
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Well obviously it was just a coincidence. If it worked like that then it wouldn’t be impressive. But the odds of that just happening to work out perfectly like that have to be astronomical

Read full topic
item.source: I would like devs to confirm this and give me a medal
